languages.text: This allows you to set the difficulty of space combats: affects the damage of enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%.{br} Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%{br}. Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.{br} Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

traits.locale_text: This allows you to set the difficulty of space combats: affects the damage oа enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: - damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90% - repair cost is reduced by −95% - the power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%{br} Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: - damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40% - repair cost is reduced by −20%{br} Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: - enemies inflict full damage - base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship{br} Hard difficulty provide additional challenge for experienced players: - damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25% - base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

This allows you to set the difficulty of space combats: affects the damage of enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%.{br} Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%{br}. Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.{br} Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

languages.text: Позволяет установить сложность космических боев: влияет на урон орудий пустотных кораблей противника и количество металлолома, необходимого для ремонта флагмана Вольного Торговца.{br} Легкий уровень сложности позволяет без труда завершать сражения: -Урон, наносимый врагами, уменьшен на 90%. -Стоимость ремонта флагмана уменьшена на 95%. -Показатели некоторых способностей уклонения противников снижены на 75%. Нормальный уровень сложности позволяет проходить большинство боев без существенных усилий: -Урон, наносимый врагами, уменьшен на 40%. -Стоимость ремонта уменьшена на 20%. Бесстрашный уровень сложности предлагает игроку испытать полноценный опыт пустотных сражений: -Враги наносят полный урон. -Для ремонта необходимо базовое количество металлолома. Сложный уровень сложности представляет собой дополнительное испытание для опытных игроков: -Урон, наносимый врагами, увеличен на 25%. -Для ремонта необходимо базовое количество металлолома.
languages.original_text: Allows to set difficulty of space combats: affects the damage of the enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides trivial combat experience: - damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90% - repair cost is reduced by −95% - the power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%{br} Normal difficulty provides relaxing experience in most combats: - damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40% - repair cost is reduced by −20%{br} Daring difficulty level provides the complete experience of void combats: - enemies inflict full damage - base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship{br} Hard difficulty provide additional challenge for experienced players: - damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25% - base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

languages.text: Hiermit kannst du den Schwierigkeitsgrad der Weltraumkämpfe einstellen. Beeinflusst werden der Schaden der feindlichen Raumschiffwaffen und die Menge an Schrott, die für die Reparatur des Flaggschiffs des Freihändlers benötigt wird.{br} Der Schwierigkeitsgrad Leicht bietet eine sehr geringe Herausforderung im Kampf: -Der von Feinden verursachte Schaden ist um −90 % reduziert. -Die Reparaturkosten sind um −95 % reduziert. -Die Stärke einiger feindlicher Ausweichfähigkeiten ist um −75 % reduziert.{br} Der Schwierigkeitsgrad Normal bietet in den meisten Fällen ein entspanntes Erlebnis: -Der von Feinden verursachte Schaden ist um −40 % reduziert. -Die Reparaturkosten sind um −20 % reduziert.{br} Der Schwierigkeitsgrad Waghalsig bietet das komplette Weltraumkampf-Erlebnis: -Feinde verursachen den vollen Schaden. -Die Grundmenge an Schrott ist zur Reparatur des Flaggschiffs erforderlich.{br} Der Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer bietet eine gesteigerte Herausforderung für erfahrene Spieler: -Der von Feinden verursachte Schaden ist um +25 % erhöht. -Die Grundmenge an Schrott ist zur Reparatur des Flaggschiffs erforderlich.
languages.original_text: This allows you to set the difficulty of space combats: affects the damage of enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%.{br} Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%{br}. Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.{br} Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

traits.locale_text: Hiermit kannst du den Schwierigkeitsgrad der Weltraumkämpfe einstellen. Beeinflusst werden der Schaden der feindlichen Raumschiffwaffen und die Menge an Schrott, die für die Reparatur des Flaggschiffs des Freihändlers benötigt wird.{br} Der Schwierigkeitsgrad Leicht bietet eine sehr geringe Herausforderung im Kampf: — Der von Feinden verursachte Schaden ist um −90 % reduziert. — Die Reparaturkosten sind um −95 % reduziert. — Die Stärke einiger feindlicher Ausweichfähigkeiten ist um −75 % reduziert.{br} Der Schwierigkeitsgrad Normal bietet in den meisten Fällen ein entspanntes Erlebnis: — Der von Feinden verursachte Schaden ist um −40 % reduziert. — Die Reparaturkosten sind um −20 % reduziert.{br} Der Schwierigkeitsgrad Waghalsig bietet das komplette Weltraumkampf-Erlebnis: — Feinde verursachen den vollen Schaden. — Die Grundmenge an Schrott ist zur Reparatur des Flaggschiffs erforderlich.{br} Der Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer bietet eine gesteigerte Herausforderung für erfahrene Spieler: — Der von Feinden verursachte Schaden ist um +25 % erhöht. — Die Grundmenge an Schrott ist zur Reparatur des Flaggschiffs erforderlich.

languages.text: Ce paramètre vous permet de définir la difficulté des combats spatiaux. Il affecte les dégâts des armes des vaisseaux spatiaux ennemis ainsi que le nombre de pièces de récupération nécessaires pour réparer le vaisseau amiral du Libre-Marchand.{br}Le niveau de difficulté Facile fait du combat une simple formalité : -Les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont réduits de 90 % -Les coûts de réparation sont réduits de 95 % -La puissance des capacités d'évasion de certains ennemis est réduite de 75 %{br} Le niveau de difficulté Normal fait de la plupart des combats une expérience agréable : -Les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont réduits de 40 % -Les coûts de réparation sont réduits de 20 %{br} Le niveau de difficulté Audacieux propose la véritable expérience du combat spatial : -Les ennemis infligent l'intégralité de leurs dégâts -Le nombre de pièces de récupération nécessaire pour réparer le vaisseau amiral n'est pas modifié{br} Le niveau de difficulté Difficile propose toujours plus de défi aux joueurs aguerris : -Les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont augmentés de 25 % -Le nombre de pièces de récupération nécessaire pour réparer le vaisseau amiral n'est pas modifié.
languages.original_text: This allows you to set the difficulty of space combats: affects the damage of enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%.{br} Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%{br}. Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.{br} Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

traits.locale_text: Ce paramètre vous permet de définir la difficulté des combats spatiaux. Il affecte les dégâts des armes des vaisseaux spatiaux ennemis ainsi que le nombre de pièces de récupération nécessaires pour réparer le vaisseau amiral du Libre-Marchand.{br}Le niveau de difficulté Facile fait du combat une simple formalité : les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont réduits de 90 % — les coûts de réparation sont réduits de 95 % — la puissance des capacités d'évasion de certains ennemis est réduite de 75 %{br} Le niveau de difficulté Normal fait de la plupart des combats une expérience agréable : — les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont réduits de 40 % — les coûts de réparation sont réduits de 20 %{br} Le niveau de difficulté Audacieux propose la véritable expérience du combat spatial : — les ennemis infligent l'intégralité de leurs dégâts — le nombre de pièces de récupération nécessaire pour réparer le vaisseau amiral n'est pas modifié{br} Le niveau de difficulté Difficile propose toujours plus de défi aux joueurs aguerris : — les dégâts infligés par les ennemis sont augmentés de 25 % — le nombre de pièces de récupération nécessaire pour réparer le vaisseau amiral n'est pas modifié.

languages.text: 您可以在此设置太空战斗的难度，难度会影响敌方虚空舰造成的伤害，以及修复行商浪人旗舰所需要的废料数量。{br} 简单难度下的战斗难度几乎不值一提： - 敌方造成的所有伤害降低90%。 - 修复旗舰所需的废料数量降低95%。 - 部分敌人的闪避能力降低75%。{br} 普通难度在绝大多数情况下，都会提供比较安逸的战斗体验： - 敌方造成的所有伤害降低40%。 - 修复旗舰所需的废料数量降低20%。{br} 冒险难度会提供完整的太空战斗体验： - 敌方造成的伤害为全额伤害。 - 修复旗舰所需的废料数量为正常数量。{br} 困难难度会为经验丰富的玩家提供额外的挑战： - 敌方造成的所有伤害提高25%。 - 修复旗舰所需的废料数量为正常数量。
languages.original_text: This allows you to set the difficulty of space combats: affects the damage of enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%.{br} Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%{br}. Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.{br} Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

languages.text: Esta opción controla la dificultad de los combates espaciales, afectando al daño de las armas de las naves del vacío enemigas y a la cantidad de chatarra necesaria para reparar la nave de tu Comerciante Independiente.{br} La dificultad Fácil proporciona un desafío trivial: -El daño de enemigos se reduce en un −90 %. -El coste de reparación se reduce en un −95 %. -La potencia de algunas capacidades de esquiva se reduce en un −75 %.{br} La dificultad Normal hace que la mayoría de combates sean tranquilos: -El daño de enemigos se reduce en un −40 %. -El coste de reparación se reduce en un −20 %.{br} La dificultad Audaz proporciona la experiencia completa de combate en el vacío: -Los enemigos infligen daño completo. -Se usa la cantidad básica de chatarra para reparar la nave del vacío.{br} La dificultad Difícil proporciona un desafío adicional para jugadores experimentados: -El daño de enemigos aumenta un +25 %. -Se usa la cantidad básica de chatarra para reparar la nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: This allows you to set the difficulty of space combats: affects the damage of enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%.{br} Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%{br}. Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.{br} Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

traits.locale_text: Esta opción controla la dificultad de los combates espaciales, afectando al daño de las armas de las naves del vacío enemigas y a la cantidad de chatarra necesaria para reparar la nave de tu Comerciante Independiente.{br} La dificultad Fácil proporciona un desafío trivial: — El daño de enemigos se reduce en un −90 % — El coste de reparación se reduce en un −95 % — La potencia de algunas capacidades de esquiva se reduce en un −75 %{br} La dificultad Normal hace que la mayoría de combates sean tranquilos: — El daño de enemigos se reduce en un −40 % — El coste de reparación se reduce en un −20 %{br} La dificultad Audaz proporciona la experiencia completa de combate en el vacío: — Los enemigos infligen daño completo — Se usa la cantidad básica de chatarra para reparar la nave del vacío{br} La dificultad Difícil proporciona un desafío adicional para jugadores experimentados: — El daño de enemigos aumenta un +25 % — Se usa la cantidad básica de chatarra para reparar la nave del vacío.

languages.text: ここでは、宇宙での戦闘難易度を設定可能です。敵のヴォイドシップの兵器へのダメージと、ローグトレーダーの旗艦の修理に必要なスクラップの量を左右します。{br} イージーでは、戦闘で感じる壁はほんの少しです。 -敵の与ダメージを-90%減少 -修理費用を-95%減少 -一部の敵の回避能力が-75%減少{br} ノーマルでは、だいたいの戦闘で焦らずプレイできます。 -敵の与ダメージを-40%減少 -修理費用を-20%減少{br} フィアレスでは、ヴォイドでの戦闘を全て体験できます。 -敵のダメージをフルで受ける -旗鑑の修理費用は基本のスクラップ数{br} ハードでは、経験豊富なプレイヤーにさらなる挑戦を与えます。 -敵の与ダメージが+25%増加 -旗鑑の修理費用は基本のスクラップ数
languages.original_text: This allows you to set the difficulty of space combats: affects the damage of enemy voidship weapons and the amount of scrap required to repair the Rogue Trader's flagship.{br} Easy difficulty provides a trivial challenge in combat: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −90%. -Repair cost is reduced by −95%. -The power of some enemy evasion abilities is reduced by −75%.{br} Normal difficulty provides a relaxing experience in most combats: -Damage inflicted by enemies is reduced by −40%. -Repair cost is reduced by −20%{br}. Daring difficulty level provides the complete void combat experience: -Enemies inflict full damage. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.{br} Hard difficulty provides additional challenge for experienced players: -Damage inflicted by enemies is increased by +25%. -Base amount of scrap required to repair the flagship.

traits.locale_text: ここでは、宇宙での戦闘難易度を設定可能です。敵のヴォイドシップの兵器へのダメージと、ローグトレーダーの旗艦の修理に必要なスクラップの量を左右します。{br}イージーでは、戦闘で感じる壁はほんの少しです。- 敵の与ダメージを-90%減少 — 修理費用を-95%減少 — 一部の敵の回避能力が-75%減少{br}ノーマルでは、だいたいの戦闘で焦らずプレイできます。- 敵の与ダメージを-40%減少 — 修理費用を-20%減少{br} フィアレスでは、ヴォイドでの戦闘を全て体験できます。- 敵のダメージをフルで受ける — 旗鑑の修理費用は基本のスクラップ数{br} ハードでは、経験豊富なプレイヤーにさらなる挑戦を与えます。- 敵の与ダメージが+25%増加 — 旗鑑の修理費用は基本のスクラップ数
